title: Convex Loss Functions Comparison
description: In machine learning, loss functions are used to measure the difference between the predicted output and the actual output. The scikit-learn library provides various convex loss functions for classification problems. In this lab, we will visualize and compare some of these loss functions.

meta.title: Convex Loss Functions Comparison
meta.description: Explore and visualize various convex loss functions for classification problems using the scikit-learn library.
meta.keywords: machine learning, loss functions, convex optimization, scikit-learn, classification
